message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price reflects its worth. I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you.

Alice, while I appreciate your offer, it's significantly higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product, which is a fair price considering its value to me.  I'm confident this deal would be beneficial for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it's still quite a bit lower than what I need. I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000 for the product. This is a fair price, considering its value to both of us.  I'm confident this deal will be mutually beneficial.

Alice, I understand your position, but I'm still not able to meet your price.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000, which is a substantial increase from my previous offer.  I hope you'll consider it a good faith effort to reach an agreement.
